post.author: 안병욱
post.content:
저희 회사는 아닙니다.
다만, 혹시 코스카 회원 여러분에게 도움이 될까해서 올립니다.

Good Luck 입니다. :)

Junior UNIX Administrator - Toronto, Ontario

The University Health Network (UHN) is one of Canada's largest acute-care teaching hospital organizations, comprised of four healthcare organizations located in downtown Toronto: Toronto General Hospital, Toronto Western Hospital, Princess Margaret Hospital and Toronto Medical Laboratories. UHN has a long-standing tradition of patient care, education and research.

The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience with multi-platform environments (Unix, Windows, Mac OS) and the services that provide for heterogeneous integration. Candidates should be team oriented and be able to work unsupervised.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

- Installation/administration/maintenance of back-end servers and client workstations
- Troubleshooting client machine/software problems
- Configuration and compilation of various research/bio-medical software.

REQUIRED

- 2 to 3 years experience in a multi-platform Unix Administration role
- Strong system administration knowledge of Unix operating systems: Solaris, IRIX, Linux
- Good understanding of network services: NIS, sendmail, NFS, DNS, Samba
- Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
- University Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent diploma



PREFFERED

- Programming/scripting experience
- Understanding of Windows, Mac OS.
- Working experience within educational/research/health care facilities.

This position is a temporary full time position with reassessment at 8 months for permanent full time employment.

The University Health Network thanks all applicants however, only individuals selected for interviews will be contacted.

Please email resumes with the position in the Subject field to:
ris-jobs@uhnres.utoronto.ca
post.title: Junior UNIX Administrator - Toronto, Ontario
